name: British Crop Production Council
goal: BCPC(British Crop Production Council) promotes the use of science and technology in the understanding and application of effective and sustainable crop production. BCPC is a Registered Charity and a Company limited by Guarantee. It has no fee-paying membership, and as such is able to act in an independent convening role, bringing together representatives of the range of relevant agricultural organisations, to deal with common issues and to disseminate information and opinion.
euInitiatives: BCPC arranges working groups within the industry to discuss key topics, developments, regulations and legislation effecting the crop production sector. BCPC issues Press Releases to confirm its position on key issues.
